stimulusHtml: Which of the following historical events most strongly conveys the reasoning behind commemorating Queen Njinga with the statue?

features.html:
• Queen Njinga stands upright with a stern facial expression.
  • Queen Njinga wears a crown, highly decorated clothing, and elaborate jewelry.
  • Queen Njinga holds an axe in her right hand.

mtcurado/Getty Images

choicesHtml: The conversion of Aksum to Christianity
Matamba’s reactions to European colonialism in Africa
The prominence and autonomy of Shona kings
Trade connections between Swahili Africa and Asia
